about_the_game:
TRISH GHOST SKIN PACKAGE: New skin for Trish is now available!


“Ghost Skin” makes her beautiful face shine even in the dark and gives off a very mysterious vibe along with her secret identity. Its special pattern and intense color definition will make you outshine others on the battlefield. Spotlight is all yours!

You can also meet MK.22 SSR Flektarn with its unique camouflage pattern.

[What’s Included]
- Trish Ghost Skin
- MK.22 SSR Flektarn

*Important Notice: If you do NOT have Trish in your Inventory, you cannot use Trish Ghost Skin.
